title: Never seen anyone play this champion

replies.body: She used to be a mid mage, then someone had the bright idea to jungle with her, and she was even better at that, and then it turned out she had a bug that crashed games in a way that made them irretrievable even with Riot's special recovery tool that they use at tournaments (Karthus had/has it too; not sure if it's been fixed yet), and she took a bunch of nerfs targeted at both of her roles for some reason, and now she doesn't really belong anywhere.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rUElgjTP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-28T12:50:17.755+0000)
>
> She used to be a mid mage, then someone had the bright idea to jungle with her, and she was even better at that, and then it turned out she had a bug that crashed games in a way that made them irretrievable even with Riot's special recovery tool that they use at tournaments (Karthus had/has it too; not sure if it's been fixed yet), and she took a bunch of nerfs targeted at both of her roles for some reason, and now she doesn't really belong anywhere.

Midbeasts tier list has her in A tier.

She is more of an Twisted Fate/Asol like champ, with better nuke potential. I havnt played her in jng lately, in mid you now have to use more spells to push quickly, but overall, I would say, she feels ok. She is imo kinda sleeper op, like Rumble mid
She is not like asol at all. Shes a lot easier.

> [{quoted}](name=letsfeedtogether,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rUElgjTP,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-28T13:06:21.144+0000)
>
> She is not like asol at all. Shes a lot easier.

Asol - shove and roam
Taliyah - shove and roam(look for skirmishes/pickes)

She has selfpeeling/oneshot ability W, Asol Q and R. She has ms boost out of combat like Asol. They are pretty similar, sure Asol has unique playstyle, but the core idea is same.
a sol has a better scaling. his play style is unique and he is a lot harder to play

Okay, but that doesn't mean she can't be along the same lines of things - Tiny playrate but a great winrate by mains and mains alone.

You're focusing on the wrong thing here.
sol isn't even really hard to play

she has been in around 150 000 games this month according to opgg
and around 6 million games according to champion gg in 9.10
champion.gg might be more accurate as the accounts from opgg need to be updated for the games from them to count and not many people care about their opgg

> [{quoted}](name=Ornndyr2k19,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rUElgjTP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-28T13:04:34.510+0000)
>
> champion.gg might be more accurate

Uhhh.... Champion.gg has the worst accuracy of the bunch.
If you want accurate numbers, check [League of Graphs](https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/builds/taliyah).
They destroyed her to the point a rank 5 Q doesn't kill a single melee creep if you land all 5 shots xD
I found she makes a pretty decent off-meta support these days. At least until her inevitable rework.
